core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix cinematic sci-fi with high-fashion editorial layouts.
Emotion First: Evoke mystery, awe, and anticipation.
Content is King: Every section is a scene in a movie.
Negative Space: Use deep void space to make neon elements pop.
Contrast: High contrast is mandatory (Light vs Void).
hall_of_shame: No purple/teal gradients for CTAs (Use solid Electric Cyan or Neon Violet).

layout_strategy.spacing: Generous (2x standard). Use p-8, p-12, p-24.
layout_strategy.scrollytelling: Sections must flow into each other. Use sticky positioning for text while images scroll.

buttons.primary: bg-cyan-400 text-black hover:bg-cyan-300 font-bold uppercase tracking-wider px-8 py-4 rounded-none clip-path-polygon
buttons.secondary: border border-cyan-500/50 text-cyan-400 hover:bg-cyan-950/30 uppercase tracking-wider px-8 py-4 rounded-none

cards.feature: bg-black/40 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/10 hover:border-cyan-500/50 transition-all duration-300 p-8 rounded-xl

inputs.style: bg-transparent border-b border-white/20 focus:border-cyan-500 text-white placeholder-gray-600 px-0 py-4 rounded-none focus:ring-0 transition-colors

visual_enhancers.gradients: Radial gradients for spotlights only (e.g., bg-[radial-gradient(circle_at_center,_var(--tw-gradient-stops))] from-cyan-900/20 via-black to-black).
visual_enhancers.textures: Add a subtle noise overlay to the entire body background.

guidelines: Parallax: Elements move at different speeds (y: [0, -100]).
Hover: Scale up slightly (1.02) and glow.
Text: Reveal words character by character for dramatic effect.

universal_guidelines: Do NOT use 'transition: all'. Animate specific properties.
Do NOT center align the app container.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients.
Ensure all interactive elements have data-testid attributes.
instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'Syne' font from Google Fonts. Add import to index.css.
Create a 'Noise' component that overlays the screen with a fixed grain texture opacity-5.
The Hero section must have a video background or the abstract image with a slow zoom effect.
The 'Countdown' must be big, utilizing the 'Syne' font.
Gallery should use the 'Bento Grid' layout defined in the design system.
